name: Star Link
description:
Space Link is a game that was created for the Intercollegiate Game Network Winter Jam where the player controls a rocket ship and finds constellations. Each round, the player will be told to find 4 constellations before their ship runs out of fuel. While navigating throughout the universe, there will be flying asteroids that can hit you off path. It would be a good idea to avoid those. 

Controls

Left-Click - Moves the Ship

Backspace - Gets rid of Star Links

Shift + Esc - Exit Game

Shift + R - Restarts the Game Completely

Credits

Programming: EthanHelms, IsaacHhyphenR

Art: Harpexo

Sound Design: Harpexo, EthanHelms

Constellation Narrative: Harpexo, IsaacHhyphenR
